title: Trelleborg Marine Prepares for Gastech 2015
text:
29 Sep 2015 Going Places , Port Planning Trelleborg Marine Systems is to showcase flagship products from its complete portfolio of LNG solutions at Gastech, Singapore in October, 2015. 
These include products from Trelleborg’s fendering, docking and mooring and oil and gas transfer technology ranges, and experts will be on hand to talk about the company’s entire portfolio of marine solutions for the LNG industry. 
Trelleborg Marine Systems will also be joined by colleagues from the company’s fluid handling operation, who will showcase the Reeline hose, a reduced weight solution with a big impact on the reeling system. 
Richard Hepworth, President at Trelleborg Marine Systems, said: “Events like Gastech are absolutely critical in enabling us to meet with stakeholders in the market, to discuss not only their product requirements, but the broader issues and challenges they’re facing. 
To read more about Trelleborg Marine Systems in our Supplier Directory, click here 
“We’re constantly looking for ways to refine and develop our portfolio, and the feedback we receive at events such as Gastech is crucial to ensuring this evolution pre-empts and meets the needs of our customers.” 
On stand D326, Trelleborg will have its ReadyMoor quick-release hook (QRH), which has been designed specifically for smaller and simpler mooring applications, where traditional large and more complex QRHs are not appropriate. 
The USL was developed by Trelleborg in response to the market requirement for a Ship-Shore Link (SSL) which addressed the needs of the LNG marine fuel and small scale transfer market. 
Finally, Trelleborg Marine Systems will have a full-size SeaGuard fender on stand. Virtually unsinkable, the SeaGuard foam fender combines a durable, non-marking finish with extremely low maintenance requirements. 
Matthew Walker, Project Engineer at Trelleborg Marine Systems in Australia will join colleagues at the event, after being handpicked to join the Gastech Young Engineer Foundation (GYEF). 
Gastech 2015 takes place at the Singapore EXPO, Singapore from October, 27-30.
